死.definition: to die; impassable; uncrossable; inflexible; rigid; extremely; damned

死不改悔.definition: not to repent even facing death (idiom); unrepentant; very obstinate

死不瞑目.definition: lit. not close one's eyes after dying (idiom); fig. to die with an unresolved grievance

死不要臉.definition: to know no shame; to be totally shameless

死中求生.definition: to seek life in death (idiom); to fight for one's life

死乞白賴.definition: to pester someone again and again

死了張屠夫，不吃混毛豬.pinyin: sǐ le zhāng tú fū ， bù chī hùn máo zhū
死了張屠夫，不吃混毛豬.definition: lit. just because Zhang the butcher dies, doesn't mean we'll have to eat pork mixed with bristles (idiom); fig. nobody is indispensable

死亡人數.definition: number of people killed; death toll

死亡筆記.definition: Death note (Japanese: デスノート), translation of cult manga series by author ŌBA Tsugumi 大場鶇|大场鸫[Da4 chang3 Dong1] (pen-name) and illustrator OBATA Takeshi 小畑健[Xiao3 tian2 Jian4]

死人.definition: dead person; (coll.) to die; (of a death) to happen

死人不管.definition: (coll.) to wash one's hands of a matter

死信.definition: lost letter; letter containing news of sb's death

死傷者.definition: casualty (of an accident); dead and wounded

死刑緩期執行.pinyin: sǐ xíng huǎn qī zhí xíng
死刑緩期執行.definition: deferred death sentence; abbr. to 死緩|死缓[si3 huan3]

死勁.definition: all one's strength; with might and main

死勁兒.definition: erhua variant of 死勁|死劲[si3 jin4]

死去活來.definition: to hover between life and death (idiom); to suffer terribly; within an inch of one's life

死囚.definition: prisoner that awaits execution; convict sentenced to death; someone on death row

死士.definition: person willing to sacrifice his life (for a good cause)

死宅.definition: die-hard otaku (sb who hardly ever emerges from their home, where they play games, watch movies etc)

死守.definition: to defend one's property to the death; to cling obstinately to old habits; die-hard

死定.definition: to be screwed; to be toast

死心.definition: to give up; to admit failure; to drop the matter; to reconcile oneself to loss; to have no more illusions about

死心塌地.definition: to be hell-bent on; dead set on sth; unswerving

死心眼兒.definition: stubborn; obstinate; having a one-track mind

死心踏地.definition: see 死心塌地[si3 xin1 ta1 di4]

死戰.definition: fight to the death; desperate struggle

死於安樂.definition: see 生於憂患，死於安樂|生于忧患，死于安乐[sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4]

死於非命.definition: violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster; an unnatural death

死有餘辜.definition: (idiom) to be so evil that even death would be insufficient punishment

死期.definition: time of death; limited to a fixed period of time; fixed term

死棋.definition: dead piece (in Chess); stupid move; hopeless case

死死.definition: rigid; unwavering; unbendable; firm (hold on sth); tenacious

死氣白賴.definition: variant of 死乞白賴|死乞白赖[si3 qi5 bai2 lai4]

死活.definition: life or death; fate; no matter what; anyway; for the life of me

死灰復燃.definition: lit. ashes burn once more (idiom); fig. sb lost returns to have influence; sth malevolent returns to haunt one

死無對證.definition: the dead cannot testify (idiom); dead men tell no tales

死無葬身之地.pinyin: sǐ wú zàng shēn zhī dì
死無葬身之地.definition: to die without a burial site; to die a pauper; a tragic end

死當.definition: to flunk (Tw); (computing) to crash; to stop working

死神.definition: mythological figure (such as the Grim Reaper) in charge of taking the souls of those who die; (fig.) death

死穴.definition: lethal point (acupuncture); vulnerable spot; Achilles' heel

死節.definition: to die or be martyred for a noble cause; to be faithful unto death

死結難解.definition: enigmatic knot hard to untie (idiom); thorny problem; intractable difficulty

死絕.definition: to die out; to be exterminated; to become extinct

死緩.definition: deferred death sentence; commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)

死罪.definition: capital offense; crime punishable by death; my deepest apologies

死而不僵.definition: dead but showing no signs of rigor mortis; to die hard (idiom); to die yet not be vanquished (idiom)

死而後已.definition: until death puts an end (idiom); one's whole life; unto one's dying day

死而復活.definition: to come back to life (after death)

死而復生.definition: (idiom) to come back to life (after death)

死而無悔.definition: to die without regret (idiom, from Analects)

死裡逃生.definition: mortal danger, escape alive (idiom); a narrow escape; to survive by the skin of one's teeth

死要面子.definition: to regard face as all-important; to consider loss of face unthinkable

死要面子活受罪.pinyin: sǐ yào miàn zi huó shòu zuì
死要面子活受罪.definition: to go through hell for the sake of keeping up appearances (idiom)

死角.definition: gap in coverage; gap in protection or defenses; neglected or overlooked area; dead end

死記.definition: to learn by rote; to cram

死記硬背.definition: to learn by rote; to mechanically memorize

死豬不怕開水燙.pinyin: sǐ zhū bù pà kāi shuǐ tàng
死豬不怕開水燙.definition: lit. a dead pig doesn't fear scalding water (saying); fig. a person who has nothing more to lose will go to any lengths, regardless of the consequences

死路.definition: dead end; (fig.) the road to disaster

死難.definition: to die in an accident; to die for a just cause

死難者.definition: victim of an accident; casualty; martyr for one's country

死頑固.definition: very stubborn; very stubborn person; die-hard

死馬當活馬醫.pinyin: sǐ mǎ dāng huó mǎ yī
死馬當活馬醫.definition: lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom); fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation

死鬼.definition: devil (used jocularly or contemptuously); the departed

死黨.definition: best friends; inseparable sidekick; diehard followers
